languages.text: Вознеся молитвы Богу-Машине, операторы авгуров обратили священную оптику в самый эпицентр бушующего магнитного шторма. Сквозь плотную пелену помех на пикт-визорах авгуров все же отразилась неожиданная находка.

traits.locale_text: Вознеся молитвы Богу-Машине, операторы авгуров обратили священную оптику в самый эпицентр бушующего магнитного шторма. Сквозь плотную пелену помех на пикт-визорах авгуров все же отразилась неожиданная находка.

languages.text: Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics toward the very epicentre of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, something unexpected appeared.
languages.original_text: Вознеся молитвы Богу-Машине, операторы авгуров обратили священную оптику в самый эпицентр бушующего магнитного шторма. Сквозь плотную пелену помех на пикт-визорах авгуров все же отразилась неожиданная находка.

traits.locale_text: Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics into the very epicenter of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, an unexpected find appeared.

Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics into the very epicenter of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, an unexpected find appeared.

Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics toward the very epicenter of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, something unexpected appeared.

Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics toward the very epicentre of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, something unexpected appeared.

Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics toward the very epicentre of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, something unexpected appeared.

languages.text: 俄歇矩阵的操作员向万机之神祈祷着，将受到祝福的光学仪器对准肆虐的磁暴中心。尽管俄歇矩阵的视讯图像依然蒙着一层厚厚的静电雾，某种意想不到的景象出现了。
languages.original_text: Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics toward the very epicentre of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, something unexpected appeared.

traits.locale_text: 俄歇矩阵的操作员向万机之神祈祷着，将受到祝福的光学仪器对准肆虐的磁暴中心。尽管俄歇矩阵的视讯图像依然蒙着一层厚厚的静电雾，某种意想不到的景象出现了。

languages.text: 機械神に祈りを捧げ、スキャナーのオペレーターたちは、その祝福された構成部分を、まさに猛り狂う磁気嵐の震源地に向けた。スキャナーのピクトビザーを覆う厚い静電気のモヤにもかかわらず、思いがけないものが現れた。
languages.original_text: Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics toward the very epicentre of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, something unexpected appeared.

traits.locale_text: 機械神に祈りを捧げ、スキャナーのオペレーターたちは、その祝福された構成部分を、まさに猛り狂う磁気嵐の震源地に向けた。スキャナーのピクトビザーを覆う厚い静電気のモヤにもかかわらず、思いがけないものが現れた。

languages.text: Orando al Dios Máquina, los operadores de los augures dirigieron sus benditas ópticas hacia el epicentro de la furiosa tormenta magnética. A pesar de la densa niebla de estática que cubría los pictovisores de los augures, apareció algo inesperado.
languages.original_text: Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics toward the very epicentre of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, something unexpected appeared.

traits.locale_text: Orando al Dios Máquina, los operadores de los augures dirigieron sus benditas ópticas hacia el epicentro de la furiosa tormenta magnética. A pesar de la densa niebla de estática que cubría los pictovisores de los augures, apareció algo inesperado.

languages.text: Die Auguren-Crew betete zum Maschinengott und richtete ihre gesegnete Optik auf das Epizentrum des tosenden magnetischen Sturms. Trotz des dichten, rauschenden Nebels, der die Vid-Visoren der Auguren bedeckte, erschien etwas Unerwartetes.
languages.original_text: Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics toward the very epicentre of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, something unexpected appeared.

traits.locale_text: Die Auguren-Crew betete zum Maschinengott und richtete ihre gesegnete Optik auf das Epizentrum des tosenden magnetischen Sturms. Trotz des dichten, rauschenden Nebels, der die Vid-Visoren der Auguren bedeckte, erschien etwas Unerwartetes.

languages.text: Adressant force prières au Dieu-Machine, les opérateurs des augures tournent leurs sacro-saintes optiques vers l'épicentre de l'orage magnétique déchaîné. Malgré le brouillard statique persistant qui voile leurs pictovisières, une découverte improbable apparaît sous leurs yeux.
languages.original_text: Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics toward the very epicentre of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, something unexpected appeared.

traits.locale_text: Adressant force prières au Dieu-Machine, les opérateurs des augures tournent leurs sacro-saintes optiques vers l'épicentre de l'orage magnétique déchaîné. Malgré le brouillard statique persistant qui voile leurs pictovisières, une découverte improbable apparaît sous leurs yeux.

languages.text: Makine Tanrı'ya dualarını adayan alamet operatörleri, kutsal optiklerini köpüren manyetik fırtınanın tam da merkezine çevirdi. Alametlerin fotovizörlerini örten kalın sise rağmen beklenmedik bir şey belirdi.
languages.original_text: Offering up prayers to the Machine God, the augur operators turned their blessed optics toward the very epicentre of the raging magnetic storm. In spite of the thick haze of static covering the augurs' pict-visors, something unexpected appeared.
